turn.2: Alain Álvarez Alain Álvarez Menéndez (born 13 November 1989) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for UP Langreo as a central defender.
turn.3: What happened in his early years?
turn.4: Born in Gijón, Asturias, Álvarez joined Sporting de Gijón's youth setup in 2004, aged 14, after starting out at Veriña CF.
turn.6: He made his senior debut with the reserves in 2006, in Tercera División.
turn.7: What did the media say about him?
turn.8: In the summer of 2009, Álvarez was called up by manager Manolo Preciado for the pre-season with the main squad.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: However, he continued to be exclusively associated to the B-team in competitive games.
turn.12: On 18 July 2014, Álvarez moved abroad for the first time in his career, joining Cypriot First Division side Othellos Athienou FC.
